unnormalised: Chaos ensued when the address on Deepika's wedding invitation, "Plot No. 420, Lokhandwala Complex, Andheri (W), Mumbai, 400053", led half the guests to a suspiciously identical-looking vacant lot two streets over. Turns out, her well-meaning but technologically challenged uncle, Rajesh 'Screenshot-is-my-save' Sharma, had added an extra "0" while forwarding the digital invite to their entire contact list.
normalised: Chaos ensued when the address on Deepika's wedding invitation, "Plot Number four hundred and twenty, Lokhandwala Complex, Andheri (W), Mumbai, four hundred thousand and fifty three", led half the guests to a suspiciously identical-looking vacant lot two streets over. Turns out, her well-meaning but technologically challenged uncle, Rajesh 'Screenshot-is-my-save' Sharma, had added an extra "zero" while forwarding the digital invite to their entire contact list.

unnormalised: The actual venue, "Plot No. 42, Lokhandwala Complex...", was, thankfully, the lavishly decorated Sharma family bungalow. Guests who made it before the baraat spent a good 30 minutes comparing horror stories of rickshaw drivers stubbornly refusing to believe there wasn't some wedding-related scam going on at the fake address. One particularly enterprising auto-walla reportedly charged ₹50 extra for the "VIP Scammer's Tour" to the wrong location!
normalised: The actual venue, "Plot Number forty two, Lokhandwala Complex...", was, thankfully, the lavishly decorated Sharma family bungalow. Guests who made it before the baraat spent a good thirty minutes comparing horror stories of rickshaw drivers stubbornly refusing to believe there wasn't some wedding-related scam going on at the fake address. One particularly enterprising auto-walla reportedly charged rupee fifty extra for the "V-I-P Scammer's Tour" to the wrong location!

unnormalised: Deepika and Rohan, bless their souls, took it all in stride. "At least the RSVP rate skyrocketed," Rohan joked during the reception, "Everyone wanted to complain about the address confusion in person. And who knows, maybe Plot 420 will become a new landmark – ‘Take the left after the infamous wedding address fiasco’."
normalised: Deepika and Rohan, bless their souls, took it all in stride. "At least the R-S-V-P rate skyrocketed," Rohan joked during the reception, "Everyone wanted to complain about the address confusion in person. And who knows, maybe Plot four hundred and twenty will become a new landmark – ‘Take the left after the infamous wedding address fiasco’."
